mapper.select: SELECT e.EMPLOYEE_NUM, e.EMPLOYEE_ID, e.EMPLOYEE_PW, e.EMPLOYEE_NAME, e.SSN, e.EMAIL, e.PHONE, e.HIRE_DATE, e.AUTHORITY, e.STATUS, e.QUIT_DATE, e.ADDRESS, e.ZIP_CODE, e.EMPLOYMENT_TYPE, e.BANK_NAME, e.ACCOUNT_NUM, e.PROFILE_IMAGE, e.MEMO, e.REGISTER_DATE, e.UPDATE_DATE, e.COMPANY_NUM, e.DEPARTMENT_NUM, e.SALARY, d.department_name AS departmentName, fn_get_cmmn_name(e.POSITION) AS position FROM hr_employee e LEFT JOIN hr_department d ON e.department_num = d.department_num WHERE e.EMPLOYEE_NUM = #{employeeNum} and e.company_num = #{companyNum}
